about_the_game:
Today, we're attempting to make a come back with another new, unique title, trying to grasp your attention and earn your praise with a new cbs game.

Plot

This time it is a turn based rpg, where you will be in charge of your own character in pursuit of freedom and survival through out the game world, helping Gemme, Waett and the Babysitter in their quest to redeem the city and perhaps figure out what has happened to the world and even find out a way to fix it.

Features

  • Create, customize your characters, choose from 3 primary enhancement classes

  • Level up, with generated equipments gather inventory and equip them to fight in melee

  • Fight your way through the story of disasters and heroism

  • Engage in dialogue with characters in visit mode stages, gain rewards and expand your group

  • Fight in endless melee maps waves ranging from 7 to 70

content_descriptors.notes: Game, overal, promotes cartoon violence and elements of distopian, apocalyptic fantasy themes. While most of this is virtual aesthetics and is focused on highlighting anthics and self-empowerment, it is intended to encapsulate these values over actual depictions of violence.

short_description: Just like how it used to be; fight your way through the story of disasters and heroism in this turn based, combat heavy, story driven dystopian sci-fi rpg. CBS: The Beginning is a spinoff of the classic turn-based rpg rules embedded to the world of 'DOTD' with rules unique to itself and fresh story.
